definition: Marks and Spencers, UK retail chain/Martha (name)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]

sentences.english: ' Martha mustn't know about the wishes, 'Robert said.
sentences.chinese: 不能让马莎知道愿望的事。

sentences.english: And then the children remembered that Martha couldn't see the wishes.
sentences.chinese: 于是孩子们记起马莎是看不出这些许愿的事的。

sentences.english: Martha studies genetic engineering at Columbia.
sentences.chinese: 马莎在哥伦比亚学习遗传工程。

sentences.english: Anthea asked Martha to bring their lunch out there.
sentences.chinese: 安西娅要马莎把午饭拿到外边那里去。

sentences.english: Marsha was insisting on admission to David's office.
sentences.chinese: 马莎坚持要进戴维的办公室。

sentences.english: Well, I know what time Chester and Marsha said.
sentences.chinese: 我并不想多管闲事，不过告诉我你跟马莎怎么了。

sentences.english: Martha was in the hot seat because she had to lay off half of her employees.
sentences.chinese: 马莎的处境尴尬，因为她必须解雇半数的员工。

sentences.english: Kennedy had been competing in a regatta off Martha's Vineyard, one of a cluster of Massachusetts islands.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华在马萨诸塞州马莎葡萄园岛参加赛舟会。

sentences.english: I don't mean to be nosy, but tell me what happened between you and Marsha .
sentences.chinese: 我并不想多管闲事，不过告诉我你跟马莎怎么了。

sentences.english: Marks and Spencer's stocks Fair Trade cotton items as well as food items.
sentences.chinese: 马莎百货则有售公平贸易衣服及食物。

sentences.english: Martha was very angry with him.
Martha hung the towel outside on the clothesline in order to cry it out.
sentences.chinese: 马莎把毛巾挂在外面的晒衣绳上晾干。
